trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_00<tab>Nicoliaux needs the assistance of a kind adventurer.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_01<tab>Displaying an admirable grasp of the adventurer's solitary motivation, Nicoliaux offers to reward you if you can make Aunillie laugh. Introduce yourself to her with a /bow.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_02<tab>Your adroitly executed greeting elicited a response of sorts. Ask Nicoliaux what you should do next.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_03<tab>Nicoliaux suggests that you express the /joy of living, reasoning that it must be something adventurers feel at all times. Show Aunillie the /joy in your heart and see how she reacts.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_04<tab>Your latest efforts have yielded two whole words from Aunillie─<var 1A 02 /var>double<var 1A 01 /var> your previous attempt─but she still refuses to laugh. Ask Nicoliaux for further advice.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_05<tab>Nicoliaux suggests you swallow your pride, throw common sense to the wind, and /dance for Aunillie.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_06<tab>The scant vestiges of pride and respectability to which you may once have clung are now gone. However, Aunillie got a good laugh out of it. See what Nicoliaux has to say.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_SEQ_07<tab>When her father died during the Calamity, Aunillie became quiet and withdrawn. Even now, more than five years later, she rarely laughs, which continues to trouble Nicoliaux. Though he would deny it vehemently, it seems the boy is maturing into one of the adults he delighted in tormenting not so very long ago.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TODO_00<tab>Greet Aunillie with a /bow.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Nicoliaux.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TODO_02<tab>Express your /joy to Aunillie.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nicoliaux.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TODO_04<tab>/dance for Aunillie.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Nicoliaux.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00000_000<tab>I know all about adventurers! You'll do anything for a reward, won't you?
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00000_001<tab>Well then, I want you to make Aunillie laugh.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00000_002<tab>She's no good with strangers, so first you should introduce yourself politely─with a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>bow<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00002_000<tab>That seemed to work, but she still looks sad. Hmmm... Try sharing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>joy<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in your heart with her. That'll prove how nice you are.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00004_000<tab>I think she's starting to like you. Good! Now that you've broken the ice, I bet that if you surprise her and just start <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dancing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, she'll laugh her head off!
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00006_000<tab>Thank you. You're pretty good at this!
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00006_001<tab>Aunillie lost her father five years ago, during all the fighting. She hasn't laughed much since then.

TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00006_002<tab>So I wanted to...I mean, <var 1A 02 /var>we're all<var 1A 01 /var> worried, but a lot of the younglings have been following me around lately, and─ Ahhh, you wouldn't understand. Anyway, thanks for the help.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00001_000<tab>...
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00001_001<tab>...Hi.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00003_000<tab>...
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00003_001<tab>...You're <var 1A 02 /var>odd<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00005_000<tab>...
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00005_001<tab>... <giggle>
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00005_002<tab>Ahahaha! You're a really good dancer, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>.
TEXT_SUBFST013_00040_TALK_SCENE00005_003<tab>That looked like fun. Maybe I should try it sometime...
